payload.i: RFC Council skill core contract (prereqs, modes, phases, gates, verdicts).
payload.pb: Provide CAC-native canonical instructions for RFC Council operation.

lex.P1: Prereqs: CCP index required; Impact Map required for CREATE; PRD/RFC must exist; auto-generate CCP/Impact Map if missing; load agent-native + security docs.
lex.M1: Mode selection: PRD->CREATE; RFC v0->EXPLORE; v2->FINALIZE; v4->DECOMPOSE; else REVIEW.
lex.G1: Gate order (9): SCHEMA, DEP-ACYCLICITY, SCOPE-COVERAGE, CCP-MAPPING, ATOMICITY, IMPLEMENTABILITY, SECURITY-INTEGRITY, REQUIREMENT-FIDELITY, ANTI-COUSIN.
lex.T1: Transitions: v0->v2 requires CCP-MAPPING; v2->v4 requires all 9 gates; v4->Tickets requires ATOMICITY+IMPLEMENTABILITY.
lex.V1: Verdicts: APPROVED (no BLOCKER/MAJOR), APPROVED_WITH_REMEDIATION (1-3 MAJOR), REJECTED (any gate fail or >3 MAJOR), NEEDS_ADJUDICATION (deadlock/low confidence).

q: Prereqs include CCP + Impact Map + required reading
Mode selection matches RFC version rules
